name: Yearning (itch)
description:
Hi,  i'm  a computer engineer student who wanted to try making a game for a long time. I am also an accordionist.

I did this small game and i would really appreciate any kind of feedback as it is my first time creating and posting anything. Any kind of constructive comment is appreciated.

I had no experience making games, i only knew programing and not related to game dev. I did almost every asset of the game (although with a lot of reference) so please understand that it looks so ugly because i lack experience.

Also i am not comfortable with the name so any suggestion is also welcome

I hope you enjoy the game.
